attributes.action: Death Penalty for recruiting, funding, Joining or participating in terrorism abroad or at home.
attributes.additional_details:
In order to protect British and Foreign countries from terrorist activities. We must first fight terrorism on our own soil.

The death penalty still stands in Britain for treason. The cold war has gone and a new deadlier threat will take hold unless we act now.

What they did to Lee Rigsby proves this.

If the Prime Minister is ordering bombs to kill them from the air.

Then let's do it from the gallows.
